ingredients: 15 g butter (Another 5 g to grease the pan)
Pinch of salt (if the butter is unsalted, add more...)

instructions: - Beat well the egg with the salt. Add melted butter, milk, combine.
- Mix in the flour. A hand mixer can be used but be careful not to aerate the mixture.
- Grease the pan and pour batter in the center. Rotate it to fill the edges until the batter stops moving.
- When the first side is ready, it should let you flip it without any extra tool. Cook for a bit and it's ready.
variants: Toppings: honey, cream cheese, banana or non citrus fruits, nutella, maple syrup, chocolate syrup, dulce de leche, caramel...
Folding: there are two main ways, both in the picture. Either fold twice in half to form a quarter/triangle shape or like a cigar.

culinary: It lasts up to 48 h in the fridge.
serving: Powdered sugar can be added over to stylize the dish.
